questions.question: Java is an interpreted language
questions.actual: Java is a compiled language. It first compiles code into bytecode, which is then executed by the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)

questions.question: HTML is a markup language and not considerd a programming language
Python uses braces ({}) for block delimiters
questions.actual: Python uses indentation, not braces, to define blocks of code

questions.question: C++ is an extension of C
Recursion is an alternative to loops in programming
C# is primarily used for web development.
questions.actual: C# is a versatile language used in various applications, including web development

questions.question: In object-oriented programming, a class is a blueprint for creating objects
JavaScript is case-insensitive
questions.actual: JavaScript is case-sensitive, so 'variable' and 'Variable' are treated as different identifiers
